entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued April 04 at 4:33PM PDT until April 06 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: .A moderate period northwest swell arrives overnight with a period between 14 to 16 seconds with swell heights over 11 feet from coastal Sonoma County to coastal Monterey County. The swell arrives over the northern waters early Tuesday morning, moving southward impacting area beaches through Wednesday evening, resulting in a high risk of sneaker waves and strong rip currents.
